T02n2974u_001:0: Munimatālaṁkāra nanu yad uktaṁ samvṛtyotpattir iti tatra keyaṁ saṁvṛtir nāma |
T02n2974u_001:1: (1) niḥsvabhāveṣv api bhāvato bhāveṣu yā viparītākārādhyāropiṇī bhrāntā buddhiḥ sā saṁvṛtir ucyate |
T02n2974u_001:2: saṁvriyate cchādyata ivāsyām anayā vā tattvam iti kṛtvā |
T02n2974u_001:3: tathā coktaṁ sūtre- bhāvā jāyanti saṁvṛtyā paramārthe niḥsvabhāvakāḥ |
T02n2974u_001:4: niḥsvabhāveṣu yā bhrāntiḥ sā tathyāsaṁvṛtir matā ||
T02n2974u_001:6: tadbhavatvād vā sarva etadupadarśitā vyalīkā bhāvāḥ sāṁvṛtā ucyante |
T02n2974u_001:7: sā cānādivibhramavāsanāparipākavaśād asato bhāvato bhāvān sata ivopadarśayanty upajāyate sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṁ yatas tasmād abhiprāyavaśāt sarva evālīkarūpā bhāvāḥ saṁvṛtisanta ucyante |
T02n2974u_001:12: tathā hi māyāpuruṣādau yad bhrāntajñānasamaṁgibhir narair avasthāpitaṁ (2)
T02n2974u_001:13: rūpam, tadvat sarvapadārtheṣu yad alīkākārajñānasamāropitaṁ tat saṁvṛtisatyam iti vyavahriyate |
T02n2974u_001:14: tatraiva ca māyāpuruṣādau yathānupaplutavijñānair avasthāpitaṁ rūpaṁ tadvat sarvapadārthānāṁ yat samyakpramāṇapariniścitaṁ rūpaṁ tat paramārthasatyam
T02n2974u_001:15: yathā ca bhrāntābhrāntajñānavyavasthāpitarūpasaṁvṛtiparamā- rthasatyadvayāśrayāt taimirikādyupalabhyeṣu keśādiṣu vijñānavādināṁ ca grāhyagrāhakākāradvaye saṁvṛtyā sattvaṁ paramārthenāsattvam ityādivyavasthā pekṣābhedān na virudhyate,
T02n2974u_001:17: ato yathoktabhrāntirūpā saṁvṛtir ajanmano'pi bhāvato bhāvān jāyamānān ivopadarśayati yatas tena tadāśrayavaśāt saṁvṛtyotpadyante bhāvā ity ucyate
T02n2974u_001:19: aviparītārthaviṣayatvāt sarvam eva samyakśrutacintābhāvanā- mayaṁ jñānaṁ paramārtham ucyate |
T02n2974u_001:22: tadvaśād ete sarvabhāvā anutpannā eva pratīyante |
T02n2974u_001:23: samyagjñānasaṁsiddho naiṣām utpāda ity uktaṁ bhavati ||
T02n2974u_001:25: tathā hy aviparītatattvanidhyānapravṛttasamyak- pramāṇabalabhāvinī cintāmayī prajñā tathā bhāvanāmayy api sākṣāttattvārthānuvicāritayā tanniṣyandatayā vā vicāra ucyate |
T02n2974u_001:26: tathārthaparāṅmukhaṁ tu sarvam eva tadviparyayād alīkākāropagrāhi jñānam avicāraḥ |
T02n2974u_001:27: na tu nirvikalpakaṁ jñānaṁ nāpi vicārābhāvamātram |
T02n2974u_001:28: (3) atas tatprasiddharūpatvāt sarva evālīkarūpo bhāvaḥ sāṁvṛtaḥ ||
T02n2974u_001:31: na ca sarvo'rtho'pi sarvasyaivendriyasya gocaraḥ kasyacid eva kaiścid īkṣaṇāt ||
T02n2974u_001:32: ato'tyantaparokṣasya sarvākārapratiniyatakarmaphalāder vyavasthā sarvajñajñānata evānyasya punar itarajñānato'pi ||
T02n2974u_001:33: yat punaḥ kaiścic chāstrakāraiḥ pratītim ullaṁghya bhāvānāṁ nityādirūpam upakalpitaṁ tat mithyāsaṁvṛtisad ucyate |
T02n2974u_001:36: yathā- nāstīha sattva ātmā ca dharmās tv ete sahetukā iti,
T02n2974u_001:38: tena saty apy ekatra vastuni śāstrakārāṇām anekarūpavyārope vastuno na pa- rasparaviruddhānekasvabhāvatāprasaṅgaḥ ||
T02n2974u_001:41: bhrāntajñānarūpe 'pi ca māyārthe jñānasya na vastutāprasaṅgaḥ |
T02n2974u_001:44: tenālīkarūpatāyā api satyatāpatter na bhrāntatā jñānasya bhāvet |
T02n2974u_001:46: bhrāntatve vāsatyarūpatāyā apy alīkatvān na jñānasya satyatā bhavet |
T02n2974u_001:48: (4) ato jñānasyāpy alīkatvād antarjñeyanayād asya mahān viśeṣaḥ ||
T02n2974u_001:50: na hi śabdamātraṁ saṁvṛtir iti kasyāpi saugatasya matam |
T02n2974u_001:51: yad api- nāmamātram idaṁ sarvaṁ saṁjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitam |
T02n2974u_001:54: tatrāpi ye vastubhūtam evābhidhānam abhidheyaṁ ca tatpṛthagbhūtam api kalpayanti tanmatapratiṣedhāya kalpanāpratiṣṭhitatvam evābhidhānābhidheyayor upadarśitam |
T02n2974u_001:58: tanmātratve ca viśvasya rūpādivaicitryapratibhāso na bhavet |
T02n2974u_001:60: yathā ca bahuṣu māyānareṣu naro nara iti sāmānyākārarūpaḥ kalpitaḥ śabdārtho vyavasthāpyate,
T02n2974u_001:61: tathā paramārthāsvabhāveṣv api bhāveṣu paramārtho'py adhyāropitarūpeṇa kathyamānaḥ saṁvṛtir eva bhavet,
T02n2974u_001:63: tathā coktaṁ sūtre- yadi devaputra paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṁ kāyavāṅmanasāṁ viṣayabhāvam āgacchen na paramārthasatyam iti saṁkhyāṁ gacchet saṁvṛtisatyam eva tad bhavet |
T02n2974u_001:67: teṣāṁ calātmanāṁ sarvabhāvānāṁ yā māyāvat prakṛtiniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇā śūnyatā sa paramārthaḥ,
T02n2974u_001:68: sarvatathāgatānām utpādānutpādayor api sarvakālam adhiṣṭhitatvān nityaḥ || (6)
